title: 1st European Barndoor Gathering UK cruise to Amersfoort

posts.content:
harryvonstacks wrote:Can't mate, job won't allow it . However might be able to manipulate the system and bank some days off to use over that weekend ! Could do with some vw shinanigans !
JD Westy wrote:Find a way you really don't want to miss it
Fact dude! Try it again, and agin, and agian... you don't wanna miss out!

I will be going I'm sure, just can't commit to buying tickets until live put my plan into action! Sneaky beaky bending of the truth to open a few days in lieu ! If not I'll fake my death and put an obituary in the local rag!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

harryvonstacks wrote:I will be going I'm sure, just can't commit to buying tickets until live put my plan into action! Sneaky beaky bending of the truth to open a few days in lieu ! ...
Awesome!
harryvonstacks wrote:...If not I'll fake my death and put an obituary in the local rag!
LOL!

Niels - AirMighty.com wrote:Here is a new status update. January 07, 2014 stats: 46 Barndoors, 14 Beetles, 39 Splitbuses and 4 other vehicles registered to the Ben Pon Show from 14 countries!!!
Who's next!? As I see a lot of names on the list in this topic that still havn't registered yet! Register now via http://www.BenPon.nl and be part of this event in Amersfoort, the Netherlands!
And nr. 47 just registered.

48 registered Barndoors and more and more other Vintage VWs are joining the party as well!

Of course we hope to welcome you all driving your Vintage VW to the Ben Pon Show in Amersfoort. But if it's not driveable you can always trailer it, we have more than enough space to park your trailer.
And yes, even your Barndoor bus project will be counted within the Barndoor line-up record attempt!! So don't hesitate and register now!




Been on location to take some pictures of the camping area, the street where the traders will be during the show and take some shots of the parking area for visitors who are coming to the event with their aircooled VW and non-aircooled VW.
Simply to give you an good idea of what to expect when coming to the show on 19-20 April 2014.

Check out all the updates (in our Blog) on www.BenPon.nl

To give you an idea, all traders will be located here, in the 'Fabrieksstraat'.
A 200m long street located very central and connects two parts of the show!

hello,

I am joining the convoy in France but I thought the ferry was from Dover to Dunkerque but now I read Dover to Calais. Am I confused? Please let me know so I show up in the right place at 9am.
Also please add me to the convoy list:

ClausHema 1966 Deluxe
